text:
@NYGovCuomo @JLGarsh Trump DEMANDED that states allow churches to reopen. One month after he ORDERED governors to immediately REOPEN CHURCHES Clusters of COVID-19 cases are surfacing in counties across the U.S. where in-person religious services resumed.
Trump's incompetence is killing us!
